segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he's about to fall, and that makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbly and I can't watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they think their mom won't notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the sink, and she's not even looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should say something, but I don't want to get them in trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice and dry, unlike this messy kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they hurry up and finish before she turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR
